Summary: round disc that was about 25 ft wide hovering about 100 ft up beamed a light upwards no ones cell phone cameras worked the clouds swirled around the UFO
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Kahului
There were no other sightings in Kahului on or around December 23rd 2010
divs: Sighting Details It was above my neighbors house just hovering about 100 ft up.It was a round disc that was about 25 ft wide that had all different color lights around it. It also beamed a light upwards. For about 15 minutes everyone was trying to take a picture and no ones cell phone cameras worked. Some people thought it was the end of the world and started praying. All of a sudden it zoomed away at an incredible speed. Before it zoomed away the clouds swirled around the UFO. Also it did not make any noise This was in Kahului on One St. About 50 or more people saw this.
